Powering: Powering the future with data narratives!
Automatically: Automatically generate data-centric visual content to assist users in analyzing and understanding data, making your data valuable.
Employs: Employs advanced AI techniques to automatically analyze and represent data insights in form of a visual report.
Provide: Provide the most creative and beautiful visualization results to ensure your multi-scenario use.
Efficient: Efficient teamwork to escort users and provide the most authoritative data analysis results.
Professional: Professional visualization tools for you to use, with a variety of work scenarios, to meet the needs of users in all industries.
enterprise-detail: Get more value from your data in new and innovative ways.
software-detail: Integrate and embed analytics with a difference into your app.
users-detail: Create remarkable data products that delight for domian users.
suites: Calliope suites generate high quality visual narrative content in real time.
Calliope·Data-detail: Calliope·Data is an online intelligent visual data story generation platform for creating, editing, and sharing your own data stories.
Calliope·Lite-detail: Calliope·Lite is an intelligent data visualization system that can automatically convert a dataset uploaded by users into various forms of visual representations to help with the narration of data insights.
Calliope·Talk-detail: Through the data oriented question answering system, users can directly “ask” the system about the analysis of input table data, and get high-quality visual “answers”.
see-detail: Get a demonstration of the Calliope suite in action and see how the Calliope analytics solution will transform your business through data innovation and process optimization.
